Application.Controller

Class ScenarioController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Application.Controller.ScenarioController

  • @SessionAttributes(value={"limit","scenarioId"})
 @Controller
public class ScenarioController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller class for viewing Scenarios and their data.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Corti Lorenzo, Tocchetti Andrea

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getNarrativeScenarios(org.springframework.ui.Model model, int id_narr, java.lang.String user_id, java.lang.String cookieConsentStatus, java.lang.String lang)
      Loads a fragment with the Scenarios belonging to the requested Narrative.
      java.lang.String getScenario(org.springframework.ui.Model model, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response, java.lang.String user_id, java.lang.String cookieConsentStatus, java.lang.String lang, java.lang.String referral, java.lang.String language)
      Returns the page for viewing and picking Scenarios.
      When a Scenario is selected, depending on the progress on the platform, a User may be redirected to different pages (first vision creation, feelings, match or feed).
      It also provides access to a User's profile page.

    • Method Detail

      • getScenario

        @RequestMapping(value="/scenario",
                method={GET,POST})
public java.lang.String getScenario(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                                                                                          @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                          java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                          @CookieValue(value="cookieconsent_status",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                          java.lang.String cookieConsentStatus,
                                                                                                          @CookieValue(value="localeInfo",defaultValue="en")
                                                                                                          java.lang.String lang,
                                                                                                          @RequestParam(value="referral",required=false)
                                                                                                          java.lang.String referral,
                                                                                                          @RequestParam(value="lang",required=false)
                                                                                                          java.lang.String language)
        Returns the page for viewing and picking Scenarios.
        When a Scenario is selected, depending on the progress on the platform, a User may be redirected to different pages (first vision creation, feelings, match or feed).
        It also provides access to a User's profile page.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        response - see HttpServletResponse.
        user_id - cookie of the User.
        cookieConsentStatus - String, "accept" or "deny", represent whether or not a User has expressed consent for cookies.
        lang - String, language code from locale cookie.
        referral - String, invite code related to some Scenarios.
        language - String, language code passed as query-string parameter.
        Returns:
        "scenario" string indicating the name of the Thymeleaf template to parse and return to the client.

      • getNarrativeScenarios

        @RequestMapping(value="/getNarrativeScenarios",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String getNarrativeScenarios(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                          @RequestParam(value="narrative")
                                                                                                                          int id_narr,
                                                                                                                          @CookieValue(value="user_id",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                                          @CookieValue(value="cookieconsent_status",defaultValue="NULL")
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String cookieConsentStatus,
                                                                                                                          @CookieValue(value="localeInfo",defaultValue="en")
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String lang)
        Loads a fragment with the Scenarios belonging to the requested Narrative. This method is called when switching Narratives in the tabbed view in the Scenarios page.
        Parameters:
        model - Spring Model object.
        id_narr - Integer indicating the identifier of a Narrative.
        user_id - cookie of the User.
        cookieConsentStatus - String, "accept" or "deny", represent whether or not a User has expressed consent for cookies.
        lang - String, language code from locale cookie.
        Returns:
        "fragments/scenario-fragment-group :: content" string, specifying the Thymeleaf fragment to parse and return to the client.
